hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Second Room Lower Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Kokiri Sword# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #3# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Din's Fire# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: You're playing a Randomizer. I'm randomized!^${12 48 31}Here's a random number:  #4#.&Enjoy your Randomizer!

HC (Malon).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Small Key# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Hidden Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #1# major item.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Purple Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Spirit Trial Sun Back Left Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Epona's Song#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Barinade# holds...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Epona's Song#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
